name: Civista Bancshares, Inc.
description: Civista Bancshares, Inc. is a financial holding company based in Ohio that offers a range of banking and financial services primarily through its subsidiary, Civista Bank. Founded in 1884, Civista has established itself as a trusted partner in the communities it serves, focusing on delivering personalized banking experiences and innovative solutions tailored to meet the needs of individuals and businesses. The bank provides a variety of services, including personal banking, commercial banking, mortgage lending, and investment services. Civista is committed to enhancing the financial well-being of its customers through a comprehensive suite of products such as checking and savings accounts, loans, credit cards, and wealth management services. With a focus on community engagement and support, Civista Bancshares actively participates in local initiatives, striving to make a positive impact in the regions it operates in. The company’s mission is to be the premier community bank in the markets it serves, distinguished by its dedication to customer service and community involvement.
